article_text: A crowd at the Modesto Senior Citizens Center on Thursday was there to take advantage of the AARP Foundation Tax-Aide Program. The free, volunteer-run tax assistance and preparation service has been helping low- to moderate-income residents in Stanislaus County for about 35 years.

article_metadata.news-keywords: aarp, taxes, income tax, tax aide, assistance, senior citizens center, ceres, patterson, turlock

article_summary:
A crowd at the Modesto Senior Citizens Center on Thursday was there to take advantage of the AARP Foundation Tax-Aide Program.
The free, volunteer-run tax assistance and preparation service has been helping low- to moderate-income residents in Stanislaus County for about 35 years.
